contentfulSpeakers.name: Nate Hales
contentfulSpeakers.session: Holistic Quality: More Than Just Testing

content.value: I currently work as the Principle QA for all R&D projects at Riot Games. I have been in the QA industry for 7 years, all with Riot Games, with a focus on leading holistic quality for various teams. Previously, I worked as a Usability Expert and Front End Engineer at The Gallup Organization and as a Web Developer for The Williams Group.

Quality is everyone's responsibility. By shifting left and using a variety of techniques, teams can ensure they are driving towards the highest quality deliverable possible. It starts with empower your own QA to perform quality activities beyond just testing. In this talk we will explore how QA can be involved at all steps during the development process and what kinds of activities they are best suited to perform.
